department.dept_long_name: Division of Engineering and Applied Sciences

course.title: Introduction to Materials Science and Engineering
course.description: Introduction to the structure, properties, and applications of materials. Crystal structure and defects. Phase transformations: phase diagrams, diffusion, nucleation and growth. Mechanisms of deformation and fracture. Effect of microstructure on properties. Examples from a variety of engineering applications.
course.prerequisites: Physical Sciences 12a,b, and Applied Mathematics 21a,b or Mathematics 21a,b.
